short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Export comments from TikTok videos automatically.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export TikTok comments to CSV format for Excel analysis.

Effortlessly extract and save TikTok video comments, exporting them in CSV or Excel format to provide comprehensive analysis and valuable insights for your TikTok content strategy.

Features:

Save all comments, including replies to comments from TikTok videos.
Export TikTok comments in CSV/Excel format.
Export comments from multiple videos simultaneously.
What types of data can you export?

Comment ID
Reply to which comment
User identity
Username
Nickname
Comment
Comment time
Like count
Author's like count
Reply count
Pinned to top
User profile link

How to use TikTok Comment Exporter?
To use the TikTok Comment Exporter, simply add our extension to your browser and create an account. Once logged in, you can input the video links from which you want to export comments, then click the "Export" button. Your comments will be exported to a CSV or Excel file, which you can then download to your computer.

Notes:

TikTok Comment Exporter follows a freemium model, allowing you to export up to 200 comments for free. If additional exports are needed, consider upgrading to our premium version.
Data Privacy:
All data is processed on your local computer and never passes through our network servers. Your exports are confidential.


Disclaimer:
TikTok is a trademark of TikTok, LLC. This extension is not affiliated with TikTok, Inc., nor endorsed by TikTok, Inc.
